title: Pixel 2 XL having vertical colored lines appearing on frontal camera after the Beta 3 of Android 11.
content:
Since Android 11 beta 3, my frontal camera has shown vertical colored lines in whichever application that uses it.
During the beta program I opened a bug report on Issue Tracker (here), and I was able to downgrade back to Android 10. But after the stable update, I am locked in a Android version that killed my frontal camera overall usability. Downgrading is impossible, since Verizon won't let me unlock my own phone's bootloader.

These recordings show my problems: imgur.com.

I either need help communicating this issue to Google's Android devs, or downgrading to Android 10.
